attributes.text: This class holds all states that are maintained by the {@link cv.ui.layout.ResizeHandler}. Other classes can use the instance of this class {@link cv.ui.layout.ResizeHandler.states} to listen to changes to the states.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property backdropInvalid with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.
